meanings.definition: A unit of time equal to one quadrillionth of a second.
meanings.sent1: She measured the speed of light in femtoseconds during her experiment.
meanings.sent2: The scientist used a laser that emitted pulses lasting only femtoseconds.
meanings.sent3: The tiny alien spaceship traveled at a speed of a million femtoseconds per hour.
meanings.sent4: Time seemed to slow down to femtoseconds as she waited for the results.
meanings.sent5: The heartbeat of a hummingbird is as fast as femtoseconds.
